DOC.brief_title: Warfarin Versus Aspirin Patients With Atrial Fibrillation Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: randomise open label prospective study We enroll patient CHADS2 score 1 non-valvular AF chronic kidney disease , analyze thromboembolic event major bleed event follow-up period . Warfarin group take dose adjust warfarin ( target INR 2.0-3.0 ) aspirin group take aspirin 100mg daly . Thromboembolic event : Ischemic stroke systemic arterial occlusion Major bleeding : gastrointestinal bleed intracranial bleeding ( code 430 , code 431 , code 432 ICD-9-CM code ) - > Only first event case use analysis
